function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Vulnerability of iot data collection system to cyber attacks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate data delivery through web services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Blockchain and smart contract vulnerabilities could lead to unauthorized access to medical medsc","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to validate the integrity of the encrypted file","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of health
